meanings.definition: a person who supports or defends something
meanings.sent1: As an upholder of justice, she always stood up for what was right.
meanings.sent2: The upholder of the law ensured that everyone followed the rules.
meanings.sent3: The upholder of the peace was a vigilant guard against chaos.
meanings.sent4: She was the upholder of truth in a world filled with lies.
meanings.sent5: The upholder of freedom fought tirelessly for everyone's rights.

meanings.definition: a person who maintains or upholds something
meanings.sent1: The upholder of traditions kept the old ways alive in the village.
meanings.sent2: He was the upholder of the family values, always putting loved ones first.
meanings.sent3: The upholder of the garden made sure every flower was in its place.
meanings.sent4: She was the upholder of the bridge, ensuring its safety for all travelers.
meanings.sent5: The upholder of the roof made sure it stayed intact during the storm.
